snippet: Five people were wounded at an address on 16th Street near Avon Avenue Thursday night, said Ronald S. Glover, a spokesman for the Newark police.
abstract: Five people are shot and wounded at a home in Newark; circumstances surrounding the shooting and the identities of the victims, all recovering at University Hospital, remain unclear.
lead_paragraph: Five people were wounded at an address on 16th Street near Avon Avenue Thursday night, said Ronald S. Glover, a spokesman for the Newark police.

headline.seo: Five Are Shot at a Home in Newark
headline.main: Five Are Shot at a Home in Newark
headline.print_headline: Five Are Shot at a Home in Newark
